opgave.overskrift: How much experience do you have of using e-mail?
How much experience do you have of word-processing programs (e.g. Word)?
opgave.option: I have used them a little
I have used them a lot

opgave.overskrift: Could you manage to change your GP online?
Do you install apps on your smartphone or tablet?
opgave.option: I have no experience with this
I need help to install apps
I install apps whenever I need them

opgave.overskrift: Do you use digital map services (e.g. Google Maps and GPS)?
opgave.option: I have never used digital maps
I use whatever I need to and am comfortable with numerous functions

opgave.overskrift: Do you use online banking/mobile banking?
Do you use cloud storage (e.g. iCloud, Dropbox or OneDrive)?
opgave.option: I do not use cloud storage
Yes, I use it for storage
Yes, I use it for storage and sharing

opgave.overskrift: Do you organise your e-mail?
Would you ask permission before you post photos of other people on social media?

opgave.option: I do not use social media

opgave.overskrift: Do you protect your smartphone with a setting like a PIN code or fingerprint?

Do you think about whether the information you find online is trustworthy, biased or outdated?
Have you written anything derogatory about a person online (e.g. on social media or in a comment)?

opgave.option: I have used them a little

opgave.option: I have used them a little
I have used them a lot

opgave.option: I have no experience with this
I use a variety of apps

opgave.overskrift: Can you connect to wireless devices or networks using e.g. WiFi, Bluetooth or Smart TV?
What experience do you have of using digital calendars to organise appointments and meetings?
Do you name or organise files and documents so that they are easy to find again?
Do you use government services online (e.g. Altinn or NAV)?
What experience do you have of streaming services for watching TV or listening to music (e.g. Netflix or Spotify)?
Can you navigate online and find the information you need?
opgave.option: No, I think it is difficult
Yes, but it can take a long time
Yes, I can find information easily

opgave.overskrift: What experience do you have of installing and uninstalling programs on a computer?
Can you check how much mobile data you are using?
Can you restore data from a backup copy on a computer or smart phone?
Are you cautious about opening links which you are sent in emails from unknown senders?
Do you change the settings on your mobile phone and/or computer (e.g. language, sound and display)?
Would you be able to post an advert online using an app or online service?
Do you use digital payment systems on a smart phone (e.g. Vipps or PayPal)?
Do you generally abide by copyright rules when you use content (e.g. text, video or images) that you find online?
What experience do you have of writing posts online (e.g. Facebook or comments?
Are you aware of the risk of Internet fraud?
opgave.option: No, I never think about it
Yes, I think about it a little
Yes, I am very conscious about it
